detail_desc: Short, fitted dress in stretch cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and long sleeves.
Short skirt in imitation leather with decorative seams and a concealed zip in one side. Lined.
Jumper knitted in a soft mohair blend with a V-neck, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Jumper knitted in a soft mohair blend with a V-neck, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Jacket in washed denim with hard-worn details. Cut-off stand-up collar with a frayed edge, buttons down the front and a raw, frayed hem. Flap chest pockets with a button and buttons at the cuffs.
Cardigan in soft, rib-knit cotton containing glittery threads with a round neck and buttons down the front.
Lace bikini briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, mesh ties at the sides and medium coverage at the back.
Lace bikini briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, mesh ties at the sides and medium coverage at the back.
Headband in a soft rib knit.
Headband in a soft rib knit.
Suede trainers with leather details and lacing at the front. Leather and mesh linings, mesh insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Derby shoes in leather with pointed toes and open lacing. Leather linings and welt-stitched rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Derby shoes in leather with pointed toes and open lacing. Leather linings and welt-stitched rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Leather brogues with open laces, leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Derby shoes in imitation leather with open lacing at the front and a decorative welt seam around the soles. Canvas linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel 3 cm.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with adjustable straps with decorative studs and metal buckles, a zip in the side and loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Short, straight-cut coat in a textured weave with 3/4-length sleeves, lapels and no buttons. Seam at the waist and on the sleeves and slits in the sides. Unlined.
5-pocket, low-rise trousers in washed stretch twill with a zip fly and button, and skinny legs with a zip at the hems.
5-pocket, low-rise trousers in washed stretch twill with a zip fly and button, and skinny legs with a zip at the hems.
5-pocket, low-rise trousers in washed stretch twill with a zip fly and button, and skinny legs with a zip at the hems.
Trousers in washed stretch twill with imitation leather sections. High waist with two buttons and a zip fly, front and back pockets and slim legs.
Imitation leather trousers with slim legs and a regular waist. Zip fly and button, decorative zips at the top and quilted sections at the knees.
5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Top in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves, a press-stud at the back and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves, a press-stud at the back and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Double-layered satin top with a V-neck. Longer inner top in chiffon.
Double-layered satin top with a V-neck. Longer inner top in chiffon.
Bell-shaped skirt in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist. Unlined.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with a zip in the side, loop at the back and gold-coloured trim around the soles. Woven linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2 cm.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details in a slightly looser fit with a high waist and embroidery at the raw-edge hems.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with a pompom on the top.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Smartphone case in soft silicone with a heart-shaped metal decoration at the top. Fits iPhone 6/6s/7/8.
Sleeveless sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with slits in the sides.
Trousers in striped organic cotton bonded jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Yoga jumpsuit in fast-drying functional fabric with wide shoulder straps that cross at the back and a lined bust with removable inserts. Seam at the waist with a cut-out section at the front and 3/4-length legs with long ties at the hems that tie around the calves.
